author: Kreusada
description: Sends a message when someone pings you on a reply.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing, have fun. Please refer to my docs if you need any help: https://kreusadacogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cog_replynoping.html

**You should use `[p]rnp` to configure automatic ReplyNoPing messages.**
name: ReplyNoPing
short: Sends a message when someone pings you on a reply.
